subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: The reserve forward Juan Agudelo scored his sixth goal of the season off a feed from Rafa Marquez in the 68th minute Saturday night, lifting the Red Bulls to a 1-1 tie with the Vancouver Whitecaps in Harrison, N.J.
snippet: The reserve forward Juan Agudelo scored his sixth goal of the season off a feed from Rafa Marquez in the 68th minute Saturday night, lifting the Red Bulls to a 1-1 tie with the Vancouver Whitecaps in Harrison, N.J.
